# Task #306 - Standardize Empty State Patterns - Completion Report
**Status**: COMPLETE
**Generated By**: Test-and-Cleanup Agent (combined workflow)

## Executive Summary
Implemented a standardized EmptyState UI component and integrated it into SKUTable and Transactions page. The component provides consistent visual guidance when tables have no data, improving the user experience for new users who need to create their first records.

**Key Metrics**:
- Files Created: 1
- Files Modified: 2
- Tests: 646 passed, 5 skipped
- Warnings: 0
- Production Database: Unchanged

| `src/components/features/SKUTable.tsx` | Modified | Integrated EmptyState with Package icon |
| `src/app/(dashboard)/transactions/page.tsx` | Modified | Integrated EmptyState with Receipt icon |

## Known Limitations & Future Work
The EmptyState component can be extended to additional tables:
- ComponentTable (Package icon, /components/new)
- LotTable (Boxes icon, view-only)
- ForecastTable (TrendingUp icon, computed)
- BrandTable (Tag icon, /settings/brands/new)
- CategoryTable (Folder icon, /settings/categories/new)
- LocationTable (MapPin icon, /settings/locations/new)

These are documented as out-of-scope for Issue #306 but can be addressed in future issues.
